resources.string: The Pomodoro Powered Productivity App! A task manager that rewards you for your focus!

Pomodoro refers to a tomato in Italian! The pomodor technique was developed by Fancesco Cirillo who used a tomato-shaped kitchen timer at the time.

How it works:
Use a timer to break down work into intervals with short breaks in between. 
Simple right? It is! 
It is also mighty when combined with task scheduling.

To get started, simply signup after this screen, create your first task and get going! \n\nWe also have additional documentation that you can access at any time by clicking the help button in the menu on the next screen!
